page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: Of the 100 people interviewed in our block, 39% were OWNER OCCUPIERS and the remainder rented their homes from the COUNCIL. Twenty eight per.cent. live in semi-detatched houses,20% in detatched,14% in TENEMENTS, 16% in terraces and the remainder(22%) in HIGH-RISE BLOCKS and maisonettes. Almost 80% of those interviewed have a back or front garden, or both. Only 8 of them said they lived in the area for less than a year. The vast majority have lived here for more than 10 years, and 35% have lived here between 1 and 10 years. As far as PETS are concerned, most people have at least one. The most popular is a DOG, with 43% dog ownership, second are CATS(23%), but FISH and BIRDS are also popular. One man claimed he had 16 pirhanas.
